message: Took my family to Sea World a couple years back and I almost burst into tears when I saw the whales. Those fins aren't suppose to be curved! Then we went to the zoo and saw those sad ass animals. I won't be spending anymore money going to see animals in captivity, it's just not right. Sad

This is an important step to take in preventing Zika from getting a stronghold in the US. $1.9 or 1.1 billion could prevent thousands of sickened kids and adults, and prevent thousands of babies from developing debilitating birth defects. If the virus gets ahead of the CDC, the costs to the government will far exceed $2 billion. If only for economic reasons, the original amount requested is reasonable. Otherwise, we are taking needless risks to our national well being. The damage it can wreak on babies and families can already be seen in Brazil. Please urge your US representative to fund this fight to keep Zika from a devastating spread in the USA.
